region.description: The region in which to create the container. If

container_name.description: A unique (within an account) name for the container.

content_disposition.description: A string which specifies the override behavior for

content_encoding.description: A string representing the value of the Content-Encoding

content_type.description: A string which sets the MIME type for the object.

copy_from.description: A string representing the name of an object

delete_after.description: An integer representing the number of seconds after which the

delete_at.description: An string representing the date when the system removes the object.

detect_content_type.description: If set to true, Object Storage guesses the content

etag.description: Used to trigger updates. The only meaningful value is ${md5(file("path/to/file"))}.

name.description: A unique name for the object.

object_manifest.description: A string set to specify that this is a dynamic large

region.description: The region in which to create the container. If

source.description: A string representing the local path of a file which will be used

container.description: The container name the object belongs to.

method.description: The method allowed when accessing this URL.

object.description: The object name the tempurl is for.

regenerate.description: Whether to automatically regenerate the URL when

region.description: The region the tempurl is located in.

ttl.description: The TTL, in seconds, for the URL. For how long it should

description.description: The human-readable description for the group.

endpoints.description: List of endpoints of the same type, for the endpoint group. The values will depend on the type.

name.description: The name of the group. Changing this updates the name of

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the group. Required if admin wants to

type.description: The type of the endpoints in the group. A valid value is subnet, cidr, network, router, or vlan.

auth_algorithm.description: The authentication hash algorithm. Valid values are sha1, sha256, sha384, sha512.

description.description: The human-readable description for the policy.

encryption_algorithm.description: The encryption algorithm. Valid values are 3des, aes-128, aes-192 and so on.

ike_version.description: The IKE mode. A valid value is v1 or v2. Default is v1.

name.description: The name of the policy. Changing this updates the name of

pfs.description: The perfect forward secrecy mode. Valid values are Group2, Group5 and Group14. Default is Group5.

phase1_negotiation_mode.description: The IKE mode. A valid value is main, which is the default.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the policy. Required if admin wants to

unit.description: The units for the lifetime of the security association. Can be either seconds or kilobytes.

value.description: The value for the lifetime of the security association. Must be a positive integer.

auth_algorithm.description: The authentication hash algorithm. Valid values are sha1, sha256, sha384, sha512.

description.description: The human-readable description for the policy.

encapsulation_mode.description: The encapsulation mode. Valid values are tunnel and transport. Default is tunnel.

encryption_algorithm.description: The encryption algorithm. Valid values are 3des, aes-128, aes-192 and so on.

name.description: The name of the policy. Changing this updates the name of

pfs.description: The perfect forward secrecy mode. Valid values are Group2, Group5 and Group14. Default is Group5.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the policy. Required if admin wants to

transform_protocol.description: The transform protocol. Valid values are ESP, AH and AH-ESP.

unit.description: The units for the lifetime of the security association. Can be either seconds or kilobytes.

value.description: The value for the lifetime of the security association. Must be a positive integer.

admin_state_up.description: The administrative state of the resource. Can either be up(true) or down(false).

description.description: The human-readable description for the service.

name.description: The name of the service. Changing this updates the name of

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

router_id.description: The ID of the router. Changing this creates a new service.

subnet_id.description: SubnetID is the ID of the subnet. Default is null.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the service. Required if admin wants to

admin_state_up.description: The administrative state of the resource. Can either be up(true) or down(false).

description.description: The human-readable description for the connection.

ikepolicy_id.description: The ID of the IKE policy. Changing this creates a new connection.

initiator.description: A valid value is response-only or bi-directional. Default is bi-directional.

interval.description: The dead peer detection (DPD) interval, in seconds.

ipsecpolicy_id.description: The ID of the IPsec policy. Changing this creates a new connection.

local_ep_group_id.description: The ID for the endpoint group that contains private subnets for the local side of the connection.

local_id.description: An ID to be used instead of the external IP address for a virtual router used in traffic between instances on different networks in east-west traffic.

mtu.description: The maximum transmission unit (MTU) value to address fragmentation.

name.description: The name of the connection. Changing this updates the name of

peer_address.description: The peer gateway public IPv4 or IPv6 address or FQDN.

peer_cidrs.description: Unique list of valid peer private CIDRs in the form < net_address > / < prefix > .

peer_ep_group_id.description: The ID for the endpoint group that contains private CIDRs in the form < net_address > / < prefix > for the peer side of the connection.

peer_id.description: The peer router identity for authentication. A valid value is an IPv4 address, IPv6 address, e-mail address, key ID, or FQDN.

psk.description: The pre-shared key. A valid value is any string.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the connection. Required if admin wants to

timeout.description: The dead peer detection (DPD) timeout in seconds.

vpnservice_id.description: The ID of the VPN service. Changing this creates a new connection.
